name: @tabler/icons-webfont
description: A set of free MIT-licensed high-quality SVG icons for you to use in your web projects.

scripts.build: pnpm run copy && pnpm run build:prepare && pnpm run build:webfont && pnpm run build:css
scripts.build:css: pnpm run build:css:outline && pnpm run build:css:filled
scripts.build:css:filled: sass dist/tabler-icons-filled.scss dist/tabler-icons-filled.css --style expanded && sass dist/tabler-icons-filled.scss dist/tabler-icons-filled.min.css --style compressed
scripts.build:css:outline: sass dist/tabler-icons.scss dist/tabler-icons.css --style expanded --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons.scss dist/tabler-icons.min.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-200.scss dist/tabler-icons-200.css --style expanded --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-200.scss dist/tabler-icons-200.min.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-300.scss dist/tabler-icons-300.css --style expanded --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-300.scss dist/tabler-icons-300.min.css --style compressed --no-source-map
scripts.build:css:all: sass dist/tabler-icons.scss dist/tabler-icons.css --style expanded --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons.scss dist/tabler-icons.min.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-200.scss dist/tabler-icons-200.css --style expanded --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-200.scss dist/tabler-icons-200.min.css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-300.scss dist/tabler-icons-300.css --style expanded --no-source-map && sass dist/tabler-icons-300.scss dist/tabler-icons-300.min.css --style compressed --no-source-map
